statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{36 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 22 \, x + 17 , 12 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 10 , -6 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 5 , 33 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 21 \, x + 21 , 3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
